tasks.title: Setup and Planning for Test Prd
tasks.description: Initial setup and planning phase for implementing Test Prd. Review requirements, create technical specifications, and establish development timeline.

tasks.title: Design and Architecture for Test Prd
tasks.description: Design system architecture and create technical design documents for Test Prd. Define data models, API specifications, and component structure.

tasks.title: Core Implementation of Test Prd
tasks.description: Implement the core functionality as specified in Test Prd. This includes main features and business logic implementation.

tasks.title: User Interface Development for Test Prd
tasks.description: Develop user interface components and screens as specified in Test Prd. Ensure responsive design and accessibility compliance.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance for Test Prd
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all features implemented for Test Prd. Include unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

tasks.title: Documentation and Deployment for Test Prd
tasks.description: Create user documentation, deployment guides, and finalize the implementation of Test Prd. Prepare for production deployment.
